executable.title: DICOM conversion of the Iowa QIICR single time point use case

string-vector.name: inputPETFileNames
string-vector.label: PET images file names
string-vector.description: List of PET images that were used for calculating the measurement

file.name: inputRWVMFileName
file.label: RWVM file name
file.description: File name of the RWVM object encoding PET SUVbw

file.name: inputSEGFileName
file.label: SEG file name
file.description: File name of the SEG object encoding the regions

string-vector.name: measurementsFileNames
string-vector.label: Measurements file names
string-vector.description: List of file names produced by the QuantitativeIndexCalculation tool that encode measurements for each of the ROIs. These file names are expected to be in the same order as segments in SEGFileName.

file.name: quantityTermsFileName
file.label: Dictionary of coded terms for quantities and units
file.description: Comma-delimited file, see documentation for details

file.name: outputSRFileName
file.label: SR file name
file.description: File name of the SR object that will keep the resulting SR document.
